headline: Ford Gobbles Market Share as Pricing Strategy Drives Demand
summary: Ford extended its employee pricing through July 6.  The pricing strategy drove market share gains for Ford.  Through all the noise, however, Ford Motor Company's (NYSE: F) aggressive employee pricing for all customers has been a huge success and could be setting the company up for a stronger quarter.
